name: lit-html-brackets
description: HTML Template literals with a bracket syntax similar to Angular
author: Bram Gotink <bram@gotink.me>

scripts.build:lib: rm -rf lib lit-html-brackets{.js,.js.map,.d.ts} && tsc -p tsconfig.lib.json && rollup -c rollup.config.js && mv out-rollup/lit-html-brackets.js{,.map} .
scripts.prepare: rm -rf lib lit-html-brackets{.js,.js.map,.d.ts} tests/*{.js,.js.map,.d.ts} && npm run -s build:test && npm run -s build:lib
scripts.checksize: npm run -s build:lib && uglifyjs lit-html-brackets.js -mc --toplevel | gzip -9 | wc -c
scripts.format: find src test | grep '\.js$\|\.ts$' | xargs clang-format --style=file -i
